util

Class StateValidatorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.StateValidatorUtil

  • public class StateValidatorUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will help AStar to compute the adjacent elements of a given vertex. Only singleton object of this class is made available for use to AStar.
    Author:
    dennis

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  StateValidatorUtil.LIMIT_FLAG
      LIMIT_FLAG enum is used to limit X or Y to just the valid values.

      • getAdjacentPositions

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer[]> getAdjacentPositions(int rowIndex,
                                                       int columnIndex)
        This function is used to find out the valid adjacent positions from the current position
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - current position row
        columnIndex - current position column
        Returns:
        the list of Integers of length 2 [x,y] such that each Integer array is a position that is a valid adjacent position

      • isValid

        private static final boolean isValid(int value,
              StateValidatorUtil.LIMIT_FLAG flag)
        Checks if the given value is valid or invalid
        Parameters:
        value -
        flag - It is 0 when the limit check is done for X and 1 when the limit check is done for Y
        Returns:
